content:
I don't have personal experiences, but here are some tips for booking a tour of the orangutan rehabilitation center in kalimantan during peak season:

1. book in advance: as the peak season is a busy time, it's essential to book well in advance to secure your spot. this applies to both flights and accommodation.

2. look for reputable tour operators: make sure to research and choose a reliable tour operator that offers tours of the rehabilitation center. reading reviews and checking their accreditation can help you make an informed decision.

3. be flexible with your travel dates: if possible, consider being flexible with your travel dates. you may be able to find better prices or more availability if you avoid traveling during weekends or public holidays.

4. travel with a group: consider traveling with a group of friends or family as some tour operators may offer discounts for groups.

5. check for any special promotions: keep an eye out for any promotions or special deals that the tour operators may be running during the peak season. this could save you some money and help you get the best value for your money.
